column4: Hi guys. I need help. My laptop has done it again! The laptop has only a recent version of Ubuntu on it. No windows, no other partitions. Nothing more. At the beginning, I had problems getting it to recognize my laptop's wireless. Then we fixed that here at #ubuntu. Well, it's done it again.
whatevere you just said, I'm confused.
that's a command you run in the temrinal
okay, let me run it and see what happens.
Since I have no Internet access to this laptop, it is going to be hard to copy and paste you exactly what it says. But it said: lscpi: command not found.
connect an ethernet cable to your comp
